Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":728853,"totalDownVotes":54883,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":57610,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu ","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":936006,"totalDownVotes":66369,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":82054,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":318380,"totalDownVotes":95349,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 👑 [BATTLE PASS!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":61178,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 Updates are every Friday at 12pm PST!

We will be updating the game daily during Beta. Report any issues on twitter and the community server!

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera
[T]: Use Spray

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a game
🛌 Protect your base. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4390664,"totalDownVotes":371488,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":67936,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1855954,"totalDownVotes":250107,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":210817,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2287738,"totalDownVotes":308844,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":23493,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event!✅
🌊Wave ᒿ: Quests✅
🌊Wave 3: Fair Pier👻Postponed for Halloween👻

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1159901,"totalDownVotes":60659,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"DUNGEONS!🏯 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":15565,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 36q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 19]:
- 💀STORYLINE 2!

- 🏯2 NEW DUNGEONS
- 🎡WHEEL!
- 📆LOGIN REWARDS!

- 🗡️NEW SWORD!
- ⚔️3 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 💪5 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- 👿3 NEW BOSSES!
- 💥13 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️4 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 🌟15 NEW SPECIALS!
- 💎5 NEW ARMAMENTS!
- 🪐4 NEW CURSE TECHNIQUES!
- 🐉1 NEW FRUIT!

- 👹1 NEW DEMON ART!

Cr Clothing : Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":843849,"totalDownVotes":106944,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🤝 [TRADING!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":16084,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌲 Build your own island

👨‍💻 Islands Lead Developer: Brian1KB (https://twitter.com/Brian1KB)","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3553885,"totalDownVotes":341846,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":25137,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.8
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4579473,"totalDownVotes":620968,"universeId":245662005,"name":"[3!] Jailbreak 🎉","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":15256,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"We're excited to announce the RETURN of:
 🎉 FIVE DAYS OF VEHICLES! 🎉
- Tuesday: THE CAMPER VAN! Find it at The Tomb!
- Wednesday: THE RAY-9! Find it at the town gas station! 
- Thursday: THE TRAILBLAZER! A super offroader. Find it at the 1M Building!
- Friday: Limited???
- Saturday: ???
Each new vehicle comes with a list of new patches for the game to make it run better than ever! Stay tuned! ❤️

Season 5 is ongoing! Get that Banana Car!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":10315642,"creatorName":"Vans","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":32852,"totalDownVotes":1790,"universeId":2516283984,"name":"Vans World","placeId":6679274937,"playerCount":15225,"imageToken":"T_6679274937_2e80","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Vans World, an “Off The Wall” experience. Explore different skate sites with your friends, learn and land new tricks and collect waffle coins to unlock new gear! Create your own custom Vans shoes to show off your unique style and drop in, it’s your world to create.

🧢 Collect free Vans Apparel and accessories!
🛹 Skate in a big open world
🏁 Take part in competitions
💰 Collect Waffle Coins
👟 Kit out your Avatar in Vans Apparel

Thanks for playing!
Code: potofwaffles
Code: endoftherainbow

⭐ New code at 100000 likes!

Some items and features, including the shoe customizer, may require payment using Robux.

© 2021 Vans, Inc. Vans and the Vans logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Vans, Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries.","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":420188,"totalDownVotes":212936,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":14184,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2553915,"totalDownVotes":769672,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":30383,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1668205,"totalDownVotes":135737,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":18983,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Liked the game? Don't forget to leave a Thumbs Up(👍) and Favorite(🌟) . Thank you!

Don't forget to check out our group!
https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840

Group Perks:
✨Member✨
--- 25% more gold!
💫Mega Member💫
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟
--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":10960525,"creatorName":"Whacky Wizards","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":311318,"totalDownVotes":25761,"universeId":2628404708,"name":"Wacky Wizards 🐸GOBLIN VILLAGE","placeId":6888253864,"playerCount":31178,"imageToken":"T_6888253864_57d5","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🐸GOBLIN VILLAGE UPDATE🐸
- New quest!
- New ingredient!
:D :D :D

😺UPDATES EVERY WACKY WEDNESDAY!😺

Combine different ingredients, brew your potion, then drink!

Different ingredient combinations make different potion effects!

Add more of the same ingredient to make your potion stronger!

Watch how the potion effects your body!

Created by:
- Foryxe
- Jandel","genre":""},{"creatorId":10927001,"creatorName":"SUPER SAVAGE MODE","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5419,"totalDownVotes":654,"universeId":2621357931,"name":"👑STRONGEST PUNCH SIMULATOR","placeId":6875469709,"playerCount":13049,"imageToken":"T_6875469709_3521","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Are you ready to become the strongest of them all?

GUIDE
Break Through Walls --> Reach World Borders --> Teleport To Higher Worlds --> - Collect Power Ups Hidden Behind The Walls --> Become Stronger!

FAQ
- Experiencing lag? Turn on ‘Fast Mode’ in settings
- Punch terrain walls to gain double the amount of power!
- Become stronger to create bigger punch explosions!
- Train in higher worlds to gain more power!
- Higher worlds have denser terrains causing your area of explosion to be reduced!
- Upgrade Punch Multiplier to train faster!
- Damage done to stronger heroes will reflect back upon yourself!
